mapper.sql:
a.id AS "id", a.cat_id AS "cat.id", a.article_title AS "articleTitle", a.cover_img AS "coverImg", a.article_content AS "articleContent", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag",

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_article( id, cat_id, cat_name, article_title, cover_img, article_content, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{cat.id}, #{cat.name}, #{articleTitle}, #{coverImg}, #{articleContent}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_article SET cat_id = #{cat.id}, cat_name=#{cat.name}, article_title = #{articleTitle}, cover_img = #{coverImg}, article_content = #{articleContent}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
